Posts.Content: reneeb wrote: Hi, I am brand new to this, but I would love some help:) Stage 3 3cm lump-2/6/08. Adrimycin&Cytoxi 2/14-3/27. Lumpectomy n 20 Node4/18 and 1st Taxol5/16.  I HURT ALL OVER!!!  Iam working-nursing, but feel massive pain in back, legs, face, kidneys.... Doc says its normal,but how do we deal??  Any ofmy sisters out there have some advice??? Renee Dx 2/6/2008, 3cm, Stage IIIC, 0/20 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxol and Bone Pain reneeb Nico1012
